name: Attentat 1942
description: Attentat 1942 tells the story of Nazi occupation from the perspective of those who experienced it firsthand. The game is built on dialogues, interactive comics, and authentic footage. Speak to eyewitnesses, live their memories, and discover the untold story of your family!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or better Storage: 4 GB available space
